title: Server being really slow
body: Is it just me or is the server going at dial up speed? I managed to get into some lobbies and the players their also said they are having problems, any info? thanks

What's your ISP, and where are you located?

Can you paste the results of  traceroute 192.64.169.20?

got disconnected twice in promo champ select rip

Hi, 

We're going to consolidate all discussion on this into [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/TARTxsI1-connection-stability-issues-10092015).

Cheers
Mindstar
So now we know it's not just IInet... :3

Its no ones net when every other game I have loads and play online okay it always seems to be a Riot server problem the only server that has problems  US was the same and it looks like the problems have followed us over
It's not just you. Mine's been really laggy and unstable. Sometimes it's fine, around 30-50ms as it should be. Then sometimes it will jump up to 3000. Not ideal in the middle of a game!

What's your ISP, and where are you located?

Can you paste the results of traceroute 192.64.169.20?

done
same just in melbs
im sending an email once the trace is done.
mines the same as numb nuts over there
so everyone that is having the problems seems to be with iinet. Does that help at all?
i am getting this also. when it was fine last night, my brother is also having this problem.

problem logging in now after having to abandon a champion select screen as nothing would happen. no chat, couldn't change summoner, or select a champion. all other internet services are working fine for except LoL
It's the same for me too unfortunately!
Mine too , I went from 100-200 pings to 295-400pings since the latest patch updated , now i can't play anymore . :(
Yes it seems to be so. From my usual 1179 kbps to 41 when using the client, something's going wrong with connection to the servers
The most frustrating part is getting the queue-up punishment when it's Rito's servers that aren't responding!
same problem for me... also iinet... for now.. EVERYNET has way more data so switching to them
My other mates in Adelaide have been having this problem for a week and now its hit me I knew it was coming

same im with iinet in perth its been really slow today but the client hasnt fully loaded sometimes which has been like that for weeks. both my asus's its happened on were with iinet (obviously) but nothings been done so please look thoroughly past just the lagginess of the client of iinets potential problems to fix unfinished loading of clients and post game lobbies
Oh that makes sence casue Im in w.a with westnet and its owned by IInet I think
I just logged in and had no friends list. I logged out now the server wont let me in its loading but never does

What's your ISP, and where are you located?

Can you paste the results of traceroute 192.64.169.20?
Im located in W.A and I use Westnet sorry if I'm not smart enough how do I do a traceroute ?
you have at least 12 ppls IP details and yet not one fix... lol pathetic
rito = rekt
Harro
Same issue for me. loading in takes an eternity and if it does eventually get in it just disconnects anyway.
Yeah i just got home from work and i cant seem to login either :(
love it when server decides to just stop you from doing anything as soon as you hit champ select
